channel.title: Help with a NPC
channel.description: how can i make santa talk back like say "all my presents were stolen! Help me get them back by killing those icefiends" or something like that lol anyone please help?

item.title: Help with a NPC
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Go to NPCHandler.java, and in the process method add this:

if(npcType == 1552) { if(Misc.random(3) == 1) { requestText("All my presents were stolen! Help me get them by killing those icefiends!"); } }

Read full topic
